Reviews.Title: canon Eos Rebel t5i Digital
Reviews.Author: maxwell O'meally
Reviews.Content: It was all that I needed! It's just a great product, comes with all the instructions if it's your first camera, package was neatly put together and shipping was on time, I'm really enjoying my camera it's the best thing I've done in a long time, Would recommend it to anyone.

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 15 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Canon EOS Rebel T5i Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-135mm IS STM Lens + <2> Canon EF-S 55-250mm II IS Lens + <3> Transcend 64GB SDXC 10 Card +
<4> Precision Design DSLR300 Flash + <5> Spare LP-E8 Battery + <6> Vivitar 58mm UV Glass Filter + <7> Precision Design 67mm (UV/CPL/ND8) Filters +
<8> RC-6 Shutter Remote Control + <9> PD Digital SLR Camera Case + <10> HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable + <11> Precision Design 58" Tripod +
<12> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <13> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <14> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <15> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T5i Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-135mm & EF-S 55-250mm IS Lens + 64GB Card + Battery + Case + Flash + 3 UV/CPL/ND8 Filters Kit
